item.title: DBGate - OpenSource and Modern DB Client
item.description: DBGate is an open-source database client which has a modern UI. I am still checking it but one of the coolest features that I saw was the web application! You can install the web application on the server and then you have access to the database with an amazing client!

item.title: Mysql auto backup to Dropbox
item.description: In this article, I’m gonna show you how you can easily configure an auto backup Mysql database to a Dropbox account using Mysqldump and Cron jobs on an Ubuntu server. Set up the Dropbox To store the backup files in Dropbox, You’ll need, of course, a Dropbox account and an API Key associated with it. Go to your Dropbox account and generate an API Key and save it.
